short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use white screen test to detect dead pixels, stuck pixels, and other display defects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
White Screen Test is an extension to test your screen or monitor for common display issues such as dead pixels, bad pixels, or stuck pixels. This is a simple 1-click test that shows a bright white screen in full-screen mode.

You use the following color modes to test your display.

* White Screen
* Black Screen
* Red Screen
* Green Screen
* Blue Screen
